title: The Hero of Free Speech
author: VD
content_html:
Remember when Jordan Peterson was supposed to be the great Hero of Free Speech because he manfully declared he would only use a person’s pronouns to be polite? Yeah, I didn’t buy then either. But, to be honest, I don’t really care what Twitter does as it continues to augur in on its corporate death spiral.

DISCUSS ON SG
